title: Corporate and Nonprofit Events
copy: Please fill out our inquiry form to learn more about rental opportunities.   Make the most of the museum setting and treat your guests to a one-of-a-kind experience by adding a private gallery viewing to your event. For large corporate gatherings requiring theater space, Rubloff Auditorium and Fullerton Hall are available as add-ons to your venue rental. Please note that these spaces must be booked in conjunction with a catering package and reception space.
